emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group of men, one wearing sunglasses, and boys, including one wearing basket weave patterned button down collared shirt, standing mouth opened, gathered in pavilion at South Park for the annual Pittsburgh Courier Newsboys' Picnic
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 2, 1961, pg. 20 reads: " "Get Back In Line" was the war cry of the members of the committee whenever the goodies were served."
